profile:
For 416-SO-CLEAN COVID-19 - Infectious Disease Preparedness Response Plan, pls see: https://www.416soclean.ca/covid-19-prepare.html 

416-SO-CLEAN is a certified & locally-owned company that specializes in residential and commercial carpet, upholstery & duct cleaning. Established in 2003, 416-SO-CLEAN has amassed a 98% Homestar rating that showcases our exemplary workmanship. We go as far as guaranteeing our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee with our "Love it or Don't Pay Guarantee". 

We use environmentally-safe cleaning products with state of the art truck-mounted steam cleaning technology for carpet and duct cleaning. We also offer a premium Detox and Platinum cleaning plans to eliminate allergens and pet stains, as well as fabric protection. We are located in North York, however, our trucks service all major cities from Mississauga to Oshawa.

profile:
**WARNING** (WE DO NOT telemarket at all ,beware of companies claiming to be us. If you DONT call us we / I WILL NOT call you.) There has been recently a company trying to gather business working off my good name. It’s not acceptable please BE CAREFUL! 


Dial One Professional Duct Cleaning™ has been servicing the Southern Ontario area for nearly 16 years with great success. Over these years we have had the opportunity to service an extensive number of clients, ranging from ultra high end residential and commercial to community based residential homes and Businesses. Owner and founding father Josiah Henhawk to this day takes a personal approach to the growth and daily operation of our corporation. Each of our staff members has been hand selected and personally trained by Mr. Henhawk himself. It is this practice that ensures the quality and workmanship of our services to be consistent and held to the highest industry levels. Mr. Henhawk is an owner with a heart. When it comes to the processes and equipment that our technicians have at their disposal, nothing is spared. Dial One Professional Duct Cleaning™ utilizes some of the industry’s most advanced air quality purifying equipment on the market. Our staff of professional technicians have been instructed and trained to utilize the best industrial equipment for even the simplest of jobs. It is this mentality coupled with our trade secret methods that ensure our clients 100% satisfaction. The large number referrals received by Dial One Professional Duct Cleaning™ assures us that the personal attention given to each of our clients pays off. Let us take care of your family’s air; it’s what we do best! Call our sales department for a no obligation FREE home estimate today.

ALSO PLEASE CHECK OUT OUR NEW VIDEO---http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VWe1nQCITw

profile:
DAVESDUCTS (formerly DAVE'S DUCT CLEANING)are CERTIFIED members of the NATIONAL AIR DUCT CLEANER'S ASSOCIATION (NADCA), HRAI, TSSA and Ambassadors of the QUALIFIED AIR DUCT CLEANING AFFILIATION (QUADCA) We are also an ACCREDITED BUSINESS listed with the BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU (BBB), AN OFFICIAL BAEUMLER APPROVED CONTRACTOR an OFFICIAL AIR MILES Reward Miles Sponsor and are the OFFICIAL DUCT CLEANING PARTNERS of HABITAT FOR HUMANITY Durham and Greater Toronto Area.

SERVICES INCLUDE: Furnace and AC Repair, Service and Installation, Tankless Water Heater Installation, HVAC installation and Design, Indoor Air Quality, AEROSEAL Duct Sealing and NADCA Certified Duct Cleaning

STANDARDIZED PRICING: $379 + tax up to 16 vents, each additional vent is $5

Give us a call at 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com, we PROMISE we won't let you down!

-----------
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM! www.instagram.com/davesducts
LIKE US ON FACEBOOK!
https://www.facebook.com/davesductsinc
service_area:
DID YOU KNOW?
- our rate is standardized for residential duct cleaning: $299 + hst up to 15 vents, each additional vent is $5.
- for crawlspaces, multiple furnaces, condos, commercial buildings, industrial spaces, furnace blower/ac coil cleaning and dryer vent cleaning - please call 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com
- we want you to be happy with our service, if there is anything that you are not happy with before, during or after our service; let us know - we'll be happy to correct it; we want you to know that we value your business and will always ensure we perform this service properly and thoroughly for you and your home.
- we encourage you to shadow us as we work; we have nothing to hide; we want you to know everything about the work we are doing in your home so if you've got questions...ask away!
- all our air duct cleaning technicians have passed numerous background checks for your security, comfort and peace of mind! We are all BackCheck verified!
- we believe that consumers have the right to know everything about the services they're receiving in their home; QUADCA was created to help and protect consumers from "blow and go" air duct cleaning companies - we are the official QUADCA Ambassador for the Greater Toronto Area. Visit www.quadca.com for more information!
- for a company to be considered NADCA certified, they are only required to have 1 ASCS (Air Systems Cleaning Specialist); We have EIGHT (8) ASCS Technicians and NINE (9) VMTs (Ventilation Maintenance Technicians) to serve you and your home!
- we also have (6) SIX CVI (Certified Ventilation Inspectors) on staff that can inspect your residential, commercial or industrial HVAC systems.
- NADCA publishes the names of individuals that hold the ASCS designation, make sure your home is being cleaned by a certified and qualified individual; to find out if your technician is certified, please visit: www.nadca.com
- ASCS is the HIGHEST level of certification you can possess; VMT is the bare MINIMUM level of certification your cleaning technician should possess
- We will only send ASCS cleaning technicians to perform our service in your home!
- we DO NOT sub-contract our work and DO NOT telemarket
- we maintain 3 vehicles, 1 inspection vehicle and have 10 employees on payroll with full health benefits
- we are members of WSIB and have $5M in comprehensive business liability insurance
- we provide PROOF OF WORK by taking before/after pictures; this is the only way we know an HVAC system is thoroughly cleaned!
- your service should take between 2-3 hours with a 2 person crew (based on a 2000-3000 sq ft home)
- we are only able to accommodate 3 jobs maximum per day per vehicle
- if a job takes longer than anticipated to complete, we will always stay as long as it takes to complete the job properly and will always advise our customers accordingly
- your service can be performed with either truck mounted, van mounted or portable HEPA filtered vacuums; all these machines conform to NADCA standards and will yield the same results: CHECK OUT THIS VIDEO: http://bit.ly/1h78y0X
- the length of time it takes to clean an HVAC system is NOT dependent on type of equipment used; provided equipment conforms to NADCA standards
- time it takes to clean an HVAC system is dependent on: 1) ACCESS 2) SIZE OF HVAC SYSTEM 3) TYPE OF HVAC SYSTEM 4) OTHER SERVICES PERFORMED - each HVAC system is different and should be treated as such!
- NADCA certified professionals have the ability to properly assess, maintain and restore all types of HVAC systems
- your vents should always be sealed during the cleaning process
- when done properly, your HVAC system need not be cleaned for at least 5-7 years (under normal living conditions).
- for more information, we've compiled various resources (videos and cleaning standards) to educate you and your family better, copy and paste the following link: http://www.davesducts.com/faq/consumer-education

To view our service area map, copy and paste the following link: http://bit.ly/U3Pt5c

For references (as early as today) or questions about your HVAC system or just to say 'hello' - please call! (416) 668-4607 or visit: www.davesducts.com - WE LOOK FORWARD TO SERVING YOU AND YOUR HOME!
hours: 8:30am - 3pm (We budget 3 jobs MAX per vehicle per day)

profile:
A Message from the President
Hello I’m Steven Desjardins, President of Oliver Heating & Cooling.

I Know that there are a lot of choices out there for your heating and cooling needs and I would like to personally thank you for visiting our Website and considering us as a potential provider for your family’s home comfort.

Oliver Heating & Cooling was founded right here in Aurora in 1924 by Thomas Howard Oliver, that’s some 95 summers and 95 winters ago… Over the years we have recognized the changing needs of our customers especially when it comes to your home comfort.

We have partnered with the most technologically advanced Manufacturer’s who provide the highest efficiency furnaces and air conditioning products and brought them to York Region. with the rising cost of energy, finding the right products at the best prices has never been more important.

We are extremely proud to be serving our community. From all of my staff to you, we greatly appreciate the opportunity to serve you and we won’t let you down.

TH would be proud.
sincerely
Steven Desjardins
President

profile:
At Mechatronic Plank, with an experienced and trained team, we provide you with 35 years of successful experience in the design, installation, commission, maintenance and repair of various units in industries such as IT, textiles, pharmaceuticals and air conditioning.
Now we are by your side at any time and anywhere, to warm your cold winter and turn your hot summer into a pleasant one.
The company is ready to serve in production, commercial and residential units by using modern equipment, manufacturers' recommendations, applying its valuable experiences and following the most up-to-date safety and technical instructions approved by Canada.
Mechatronic Planck gives you the power to make the right decision based on the information we provide to you to choose the most suitable system for the comfort of yourself and your family.  You can be sure that you and your family will receive quality and proven services that are right for you.
We believe that you, your esteemed family your and colleagues deserve the best in any environment, so it is our mission to provide you with this pleasant environment throughout the year by servicing, maintaining or repairing your systems.
It's time to contact us and experience our professional and fair treatment.

profile: THANK YOU for considering us as your potential Duct Cleaning Contractor. VISIT US ONLINE FOR MORE INFORMATION ON OUR COMPANY & PRICING Call today for more information on our Duct Cleaning Service and for an Free Phone Estimate. 647-514-3828. You can also visit us online at You can also visit us online FOLLOW US ON TWITTER LIKE US ON FACEBOOK DIRTY DUCTS - The Duct Cleaning Specialists is a family owned and operated company in Southern Ontario. We are fully operational all year round and have specialized in Residential and Commercial Air Duct Cleaning for the past 18 years. Our goal is to achieve a healthier, cleaner, and safer indoor environment for you and your loved ones; while providing dependable, timely, quality service, and 100% customer satisfaction. We utilize “Source Removal,” the mechanical cleaning of system components to remove dirt and debris. We follow all guidelines set forth by the National Air Duct Cleaners Association (NADCA) as published in the Assessment, Cleaning & Restoration of HVAC systems. A copy of this standard is available upon request. The Duct Cleaning Specialists strive to provide the highest quality, most reliable service in the industry to help our customers achieve better indoor air quality and to assist them in taking a proactive approach to their air system maintenance, thereby reducing the need for costly repairs. All materials contained on this Web site, including design, text, images, graphics, the selection and arrangement thereof, are Copyright © by The Duct Cleaning Specialists. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. Any use of the materials on this Web site -- including linking or posting to another website, reproduction, modification, distribution, or republication -- without the prior written permission of The Duct Cleaning Specialists is strictly prohibited and actively enforced.

profile:
Our goal is to build long lasting relationships with all of our customers and to achieve a healthier, cleaner and a safer indoor environment for you and your loved ones.  Our focus is on customer satisfaction, you can be confident that when we enter your home you and your belongings will be treated with utmost care and respect.
 We operate all year round providing exceptional services to each and every customer and we are obsessed with providing a superior service.  We dedicate our company to educating our customers on how to maintain their system long after we are gone.  If you use our services you will see it’s not just a job that’s done in your home but an experience.  We know what it takes to give you a full and complete cleaning and we pride ourselves on the quality of work we leave behind.
 We make sure every technician is well trained and we deliver an honest service for a fair price. We also maintain liability insurance coverage to give our customers that extra piece of mind. Our truck mounted equipment comes with the latest technologies available and the friendliest technicians.  We hope you will find our team and our process superior than most other Duct Cleaning companies on the market.
 You can be confident that when deciding on a Duct Cleaning company that Delux Dux will deliver by getting the job done right and that is why we offer 100% satisfaction guarantee.  We appreciate your business and we know that there are plenty of options for homeowners when choosing a company to do their Duct Cleaning.

profile:
Ontario Duct Cleaning was one of the first companies of its kind in Ontario.  By placing emphasis on fair pricing, good service and excellent workmanship, we have gained a reputation for professionalism.  In the residential market we can clean most duct systems, HVAC and dryer vents.  In addition, we also cater to commercial and industrial markets.
At Ontario Duct Cleaning we believe that service and quality come first and foremost, and every customer large or small will receive that same level of service. This attitude has served our customers and our selves well in the past and we are committed to continuing to provide the very best service in the industry.
